DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study study position stabilization different cardiac wall perform off-pump coronary artery bypass grafting ( CABG ) may dissimilar impact hemodynamics . The objective evaluate hemodynamics distal coronary anastomosis different cardiac wall .
DOC.brief_title: Hemodynamic Changes Off-pump Coronary Artery Bypass Grafting
DOC.detailed_description: - Twenty patient undergo off-pump CABG monitor pulmonary artery catheter esophageal doppler enrol . - Patients leave ventricular ejection fraction < 50 % , age > 80 yr , creatinine > 1.4 mg/dl , reoperation , valvular heart disease chronic obstructive pulmonary disease exclude - Data collect volemic hemodynamic adjustment , heart position establishment suction stabilizer removal anterior , lateral posterior wall artery anastomosis . - Data compare mean two-way repeated measure ANOVA .
DOC.criteria: Normal leave ventricular function Minimal moderate surgical risk accord criterion propose Higgins et al .
